name: brazenness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour in which someone does something in a very obvious way, without trying to hide it: The brazenness of the theft shocked museum officials. She was shocked by the sheer brazenness of their behaviour.
More examplesFewer examplesThe brazenness of this new breed of burglar is what shocks people.His characteristic brazenness nearly always serves him well in a crisis.The attack exemplified what some teachers describe as a new brazenness.
